alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 6:32AM CDT until June 14 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PERRY...SOUTHWESTERN CONWAY...EAST CENTRAL YELL AND SOUTHEASTERN POPE COUNTIES... At 632 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Galla Creek WMA, or 9 miles southeast of Russellville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Morrilton... Perryville... Atkins... Pottsville... Oppelo... Perry... Adona... Houston... Petit Jean State Park... Sequoya Park... Carden Bottoms... Galla Creek WMA... Casa... Aplin... Ada... Lakeview in Yell County... Holla Bend... Blackwell... Pontoon... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
